snippet: McCUE--Joseph Albert. November 15, 1935 - April 22, 2016. Joseph Albert McCue of Edmonds, WA passed away peacefully of cancer on Friday, April 22, 2016 in Seattle, WA. He was 80 years old. Joe was born in Glasgow, Scotland and moved to the United States when he was an infant. He enjoyed his years in parochial school and graduated from the University of Notre Dame in 1958. Joe is survived by four daughters: Frances, Jennifer, Clare (Kevin Reuter), and Amy. Joe cherished his six grandchildren: Madeleine (20), Kyla (11), Seneca (10), Cartney (9), Ellie (9) and Sadie (7). His wife of 44 years, Patricia Kavanagh McCue, passed away in 2011. To read his full obituary and share memories with his family, please go to: www.becksfuneralhome.com 1/3
